title: 555 39 "Deadly Attacks One After Another! Zoro and Sanji Join the Battle!"Transliteration: "Ōwaza Sakuretsu! Zoro to Sanji Shutsugeki!" (Japanese:大技炸裂！ゾロ・サンジ出撃！) Takahiro Imamura Tomohiro Nakayama July 8, 2012(2012-07-08) June 5, 2022
transformers_text: 555 39 Deadly Attacks One After Another Zoro and Sanji Join the Battle Transliteration waz a S a kure tsu Zoro to Sanji Shuts u geki Japanese Takahiro Imamura Tomohiro Nakayama July 8 2012 2012 07 08 June 5 2022 The Straw Hat Pirates begin their attack with Luffy Zoro and Sanji taking the lead in the fight but mostly it is the latter two of the three who begin showing their new powers and abilities from their two year separation and training Zoro starts showing off his newly modified sword attacks while Sanji displays a more powerful style of kicking
